snippet: United Nations secretary general, Ban Ki-moon cautiously recommended that the Security Council approve the force without financing it.
abstract: African Union appeals for United Nations to pay for military operation to combat Islamist extremists in northern Mali after UN Secretary General Ban Ki-moon cautiously recommended that Security Council approve force without financing it.
lead_paragraph: United Nations secretary general, Ban Ki-moon cautiously recommended that the Security Council approve the force without financing it.

headline.main: African Union Asks United Nations to Finance Intervention in Mali
headline.print_headline: African Union Asks United Nations To Finance Intervention in Mali
